record.description: First faculty [members who will teach at the University of] Frankfurt take off from the Chicago airport as families and friends wave bon voyage. On stairs, second row: Wilhelm Pauck, Mrs. Louis Thurstone, Everett C. Hughes, and Roger B. Oake; first row: Paul A. Weiss, Louis Thurstone, Elder J. Olson, Margaret Ruth, and Mrs. Oake.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Photography stamp, one coy has PR stamp. Attached and separate captions.
